cause.description:
Mike Huckabee is taking huge steps towards national health care because he is refusing to receive health care until everyone in America has it. We should be aware that people without health care suffer of high priced doctor visits and procedures they cannot receive because they do not have enough money.
1. National Health Care is necessary
2. Why bother having a health care system that is available only to the middle class and higher
cause.mission: raise awareness that people without health care pay more and are becoming poor
cause.name: NATIONAL HEALTH CARE
